title: Louis and the Animal Book
story: Louis got a new book. The book was about animals. Louis loved animals. The book had lots of pictures. It had pictures of dogs and cats. It had pictures of cows and pigs. It had pictures of chickens and rabbits. It had pictures of squirrels and birds. Louis looked at the pictures on the first page. Then he turned the page. He looked at the pictures on the second page. Then he turned the page again. The book had 30 pages in it. Louis looked at all the pictures on all the pages.
summary: Louis explores a book about animals filled with colorful pictures and learns about different types of animals.
image: An image of Louis holding the animal book with a big smile on his face.
